name: allowance-guard-extension
description: AllowanceGuard Browser Extension - Protect your wallet from risky token approvals

scripts.build: npm run copy-files && npm run copy-icons
scripts.copy-files: cp src/*.js dist/ && cp popup.html dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../allowance-guard-extension.zip .

author: Allowance Guard Team
